result.execSummary:
The defendant Kiera C Thompson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Straight time, (without work release).  Sentence credit for 2 days were granted.

miscConds.notes: Restitution in the amount of $672.64 to be paid to North Face, Joint and severally, as a condition of probation.
Costs/DNA Surcharge to be paid as a condition of probation.

No contact with North Face in the City of Brookfield.
No contact with co-actor.
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.
  Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

records.addlTxt: Second Amended Information
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Kiera C Thompson in court with attorney Robert E Webb.  Kristi J Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  2nd amended information filed in Court.  Defense waives formal reading and enters a NOT GUILTY plea.  Defendant pleads guilty to count #2 with the repeater struck.  Court finds the defendant guilty of count 2.  State makes recommendations.  Attorney Webb makes statements.  Defendant makes statements.  

The Court Orders the Following:  Count #2. 

Imposed and Stayed Sentence of:

180 Days jail without work release.  (credit of 2 days)

Term of Probation: 1 Year

Conditions of Probation:

Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
	
No contact with North Face in the City of Brookfield, No contact with Co-Actor.

Maintain/Obtain full time employment;

Condition Time: 20 days Huber with  NON WORKING HOURS WITH STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS -  STAYED to be used at the Agents discretion

Restitution: $672.64 to be paid to North Face, joint and severally.  

COSTS:  $253.00 to be paid as a condition of probation

DNA Surcharge: $200.00 to be paid as a condition of probation

DNA Sample ordered and to be provided immediately if in custody or within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
